name: Re(re4ti0n
description:
Work for the National Archival and Reconstruction Foundation (NARF), where data from the past is archived and reconstructed for the future!

Be part of the Film Department, where you'll be given the task of reviewing and reconstructing partially destroyed/corrupted lines of dialogue.

This training simulation will show you what it's like and test how accurate your recreational skills are based on our collection of fully restored lines.

Game developed for #WizardJam with the theme "Read Our Lips".
